review: After owning a chromecast and fiddling around with my friends Roku streaming stick, I can honestly say that the Firestick is so much better.One thing I love about the Firestick is the included remote. The chromecast required you to use an app on the phone, and I just never really liked the fact that you were forced to use the app. The remote is very responsive, and fits well in my hand. It's very easy to use as well.The Firestick offers an app available for Android and iOS that essentially acts like a remote (even has voice control, which is pretty neat).There is also a ton of apps on the Firestick that can be downloaded. Personally, I use Pandora, Netflix, and CrunchyRoll on a regular basisI would definitely recommend this product. It packs quite a punch, and performs well above other steaming sticks within this price range.
